name: GetMembershipInfo
description:
Retrieve membership record details by ID.

Fetches information for a specified membership ID, including project, goal, portfolio, or custom field memberships.

parameters.name: membership_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the membership. Used to specify which membership record to retrieve.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the membership.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable pretty output with indentation and line breaks for readability. Use for debugging as it increases response size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: membership_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the membership.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the membership.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
